content: We would never have gotten this season from Russ if KD had stayed in OKC. Thunder fans would obviously prefer that KD had stayed and that the team was contending for the title, but for the rest of us, Westbrook’s record setting usage rate and turnovers (along with the other stuff) has been must see TV all season long. 41.8% usage rate? 434 TOs?? Inconceivable!
